name: wallsend-occupational-therapy
description: Service booking platform for Wallsend Occupational Therapy

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint

author: Wallsend Occupational Therapy
